name: Mafia Shooting War
description:
Time for the rapid action and get the joy of first person shooter shooting game. It's a war against mafia & real assault FPS shooter are going to have critical strike order against you in the aged of modern warfare. Defend your nation against the black ops of mafia & reveal our immersive tactical skills. It's your duty to fight against modern terrorist warfare & black ops mafia. Strike against the mafia gangsters and end the counter terrorist operations war. These counter and offensive operations required real skills and us army training. We have information that some terrorist are supporting the mafia and gangsters, so defuse the bomb and defeat the enemy combat forces in the form of mafia. counter mafia strike in this critical fps war game.

Features:
• Engaging FPS gameplay
• Realistic shooting effect
• Powerful modern weapons
• Challenging missions to compete
• Thrilling sound effects
• Amazing graphics
